11.title: Boy

111.content:
Your at your house watching tv, when the mailman arrives with a package.
"I'll need you to sign for it sir." you signed the form and he handed you a package. It was addressed to you, but had no return address. You opened up the box to find a package full of diapers. You panicked a little at seeing this, so you ran into your room with them and locked the door.
"why would someone send me diapers? I didn't order any." you said. You did have a diaper fetish, but you kept that your deepest darkest secret from everybody, even your own family.
You thoroughly examined the package of diapers, until you found a note that read: Congratulations Logan, you have been chosen. Use these diapers wisely, for they have the power to grant any wish." you were amazed at hearing this, but you were still skeptic, so you decided to test it. You put on one of the diapers and made a wish.
"I wish
111.title: Diaper

1111.content:
"I wish that everyone on tv was naked except for diapers." the diaper started glowing and you felt it tingle. When it stopped you turn onto the tv and saw all the characters diapered completely oblivious to any change.
"holy shit it does work!" you exclaim.
"ok first things first, I'll have to make it so I can wear these at all times so I can make wishes whenever. I wish that everyone in the world was incontinent and had to wear diapers" the diaper glowed just as before and you felt the same tingling. You heard your mother knocking on the door.

"THAT'S IT!!" your mother screamed. She used her skeleton key to unlock your door, and when she walked in she was wearing
1111.title: Tv characters were diapered

Your mother walked in, wearing absolutely nothing but a puffy white diaper.

"I uh..."
"ou, honey did you wet yourself?" after hearing this you looked down to see you were in fact wet.
"um yes?"
"well that's nothing to be embarrassed about. Everybody does it. Now lay down on the bed and I'll change you." you laid down on your bed waiting for your mother to change you. She went under your bed to get some diapers out of your stash.
"honestly, why you keep your diapers under your bed I'll never know. Now which ones do you want? The blue ones, the ones with the wetness indicator?"
"just get one of the ones in the box." your mother pulled out the box and looked at it for a moment.
Does she find the note?

Unbeknownst to you, your mother had found the note and read over it.

"ugh fine." you got up and went to take a shower. Meanwhile your mother took the box of diapers into her room.
"ok, now to see if these diapers work." she laid down and struggled to fit the diaper onto her much larger waist.
"geez, I guess I'm not as thin as I used to be. I wish these diapers fit better." the diaper began to glow and tingle.

11111122.content:
Melissa, a bit wiser than her son, made a two-fold wish, "I wish every diaper I wore had the power to grant my wishes, and that no wishes granted by the magic diapers would be twisted like in the monkey's paw." Whatever power that gave the diapers there power did so, but since it was a bit offended by her assumption and by having that particular path of fun closed to it decided to make one extra change. It made the world childish, and now no one would be mentally older than a toddler. School replaced by daycare and all that stuff (author note: This type of story is my favorite here).

Missy (once Melissa) giggled a bit as she knew her wish had come true. She toddled back to Logan's room, and saw her son crawl out of the bathroom dripping wet. She giggled and dried off her son and diapered him, all the while the teenager sucked his thumb. She then noticed the clock, and with a bit of struggle realized it was time for Logan's school and her work

She lisped to her son, "Time for daycare Wogan." Logan groaned and whined, "Mommy." Missy was unmovable and said, "Me haveta go ta work." Logan crawled and Missy toddled to the car. Missy strapped her son in and then herself in. No one was surprised at the sight of an adult woman and a teenager in car seats because it was normal. Adults toddled and teens crawled down the street, and the only clothing most people wore was a diaper. There was the occasional frilly dress, pair of overalls and nakie person, but those were normal as well. Missy sucked her driving pacifier, not knowing she had doomed the world to an eternity of diapers.

"I can't wait to see how I can use these at school. Of course I could also skip school and go to the mall."

1111121.content:
"eh I'll go to the mall some other time." you grab some breakfast then head of to the bus. The bus ride was uneventful, and soon you were at school. You were curious as to how school worked in your new reality so you decided to leave everything as it is for the rest of the day. You walk to your first period, noticing a lack of bathrooms while you do, and sit down at your desk. You felt the urge to poop so you just released your bowels. You werent exactly sure what to do to get changed, so first off you wished that you couldn get a diaper rash, just to be safe. Next you wished that one of your classmate would soil her diaper. The diaper glowed and you could see your classmate getan uncomfortable look on her face. She grabbed her stomach and looked as if she was forcing something. After she stopped she got a look of relief on her face. She raised her hand until the teacher called on her.
"yes Jenny what is it?"
"I need a change please." she then walked up to the front desk laid down on it and got changed. After she got back to her desk you raised you hands and brought up another of the magic diapers to get changed into. After awhile the bell rang and you were off to your next class.
1111121.title: Go to school

choices: Wish that everyone accepted you being in diapers.
Make a change to someone you know.
1113.content:
Playing safe and because you felt a little hungry, you asked for a sandwich.

Speaking quietly, you waited for a moment deciding that someone was playing a trick on you. Feeling embarrassed, you raised your hand to palm your forehead until you realized you were holding something that wasn't in your hand before.

Lo and behold, a sandwich was in your hand. Because you didn't specify what kind of sandwich you wanted, you received a tuna sandwich with lettuce, tomato, pickles, and red unions.

"Holy shit..."

"Logan? I heard the door ring, did you pick up a package?" you heard your mother, Melissa call from downstairs.

You flinched and cursed in your mind, not able to stare at the sandwich in your hand any longer. Putting in your mouth and taking a quick bite, you peaked out of your room to answer your mother.

"Uh, yeah! I ordered...um...something for uh...school project!"

"Oh, okay! Are you hungry?"

You glance back at the sandwich, just to make sure you weren't seeing things and then answered back. "No thanks, I've already eaten."

"Okay then, sweetie. Don't be locked in your room too much."

You sighed, glad to not raise any suspicions. It would be a problem if your mother had come knocking on your door instead of calling from the kitchen. Still, this was pretty exciting!

Taking another bite from the sandwich, you realized that if the diaper is as powerful as the note claimed, there are infinite possibilities!

Although you were eating the tuna sandwich and it was quite good, it's certainly not your favorite choice of meat. There were currently better things to achieve than eating a sandwich.

Throwing away the sandwich into your personal trash bin near your desk, you began to think bigger in terms of your wishes and desires.
1113.title: Ask and ye shall receive.

11131.content:
Thinking carefully, you figured that there's an obvious step before your attempt any other wish making. You had a secret diaper fetish, but now you could potentially wear this diaper without any worries or problems outside! Not to mention, you would need to wear these diapers in order to make wishes, so it makes sense to ensure that there would be no issues of wearing these diapers in public.

Speaking of which...

Taking a look at the package of diapers, all though a lot were sent to you, they were still finite in number. If you were going to be wearing these often, it wouldn't be a good idea to dirty them and throw them away.

So there are two wishes that had to be made.

Taking a deep breath, you committed your wishes.

"I wish that everyone accepted me being in diapers."

Nothing would obviously happen, but you'd hope that you'd be able to safely confirm with those around you if they saw anything weird with you being in diapers or not.

"Next, I wish that these diapers always remain clean and fresh," you added.

With a big stupid grin on your face, you looked on your desk for a can of Pepsi that you were drinking earlier and left. Perfect time to at least check if your second wish took effect.

Taking the can and dripping some of the soda onto your diaper, you shivered as you felt the diaper grow a little wet, but less than a second after seeping into the fabric, the visible brown liquid disappeared and you didn't feel a little wet.

Sliding your hands through your hair and staring in disbelief, you couldn't help but jump a little, giddy. With more confidence in the power of these magical diapers, you stared at your door and knew, risking embarrassment, you had to test out your first wish.

Opening your door, who did you see first?
11131.title: The Obvious First Move.

111311.content:
"Oh there you are, Baby. You know you're not supposed to wander off alone." Youre a bit confused as she comes in the room and stands you up, she makes you hold her hand as you're taken downstairs. Once downstairs you see The rest of the house has changed in small ways as it seemed baby-proofed even though no baby lived in the house.
Then your mother hands up a bottle as she strapped you into a chair near her with a seatbelt you slowly realize that theyre treating you like a baby and all you can do it
111311.title: Mother, Melissa (38)

111321.content:
The obvious path to testing what you can change is your mother, Melissa. You find yourself liking wearing diapers and the fact that you are in control and can make changes to reality is simply icing on the cake.

Since you are in diapers, you figure you need someone to take care of you. What better person than your dear mother? That said, time has wrinkled her face and her chest is not fulfilling enough for a "baby" like you.

A wicked smile grows on your face. How do you change your mother?
111321.title: Your mother, Melissa

choices: At a park for mother's to breastfeed their sons.
You and her are going out on a breastfeeding date.
1113211.content:
"I wish..." you pause, thinking to yourself. You could just make her a more youthful version of herself but you decide that if you were going to change her, you might as well make her someone ideal to you.

Unable to stop yourself from revealing a stupid grin, you continue.

"...I wish my mom...no...mommy was a busty and sweet latino woman who will lactate for me as much as I want so I don't get hungry!"

There was a tiny bit of guilt in your mind, but you squashed it. You figured you can change her back whenever you want...or not at all.

Going downstairs, you are eager to find out what your mother looks like. You expect her to be in the kitchen, but find out that she's not there.

"Uh...mommy?" you call.

"Sweetie, I'm in here!"

You hear an undeniable change in her voice which has become sweet and a little velvety. There's a hint of a latino accent in her voice which makes you hopeful.

Entering into her room, your eyes bug out as you see Melanie wearing nothing but a black bra and panties, her chest busting out in front of a mirror as she fixes her hair.

Preview  

"Baby, what is it? Are you hungry?" she asks, not even looking at you.

You fidget, unable to believe this is your mother. You find your mouth going dry, wanting to nod. More importantly, she looked like she was preparing to go somewhere, but...where and why? Did something else change when you changed her? A side-effect maybe?

You don't know for sure, but you do know that your mother knows that you are eager to feed from her.

"Um...yes!" you answer, trying to sound confident.

Your mother hums and then turns to finally face you, smiling warmly. "How do I look?"

You are taken aback by the question, but you nod. "You look...um great! Are you...going somewhere?"

'Where exactly...especially like that?' you wonder.

Your mother giggles at her son's praise. "Thank you, baby. It's not just me baby - you're coming with me too."

You widen your eyes, not expecting this development. "Where?"

Your mother looks at you exasperated, but she isn't really upset. "Baby, don't you remember? I'll be breastfeeding you at..."

Where does she plan to breastfeed you?
1113211.title: She becomes a sweet, caring busty Latino woman.

choices: You are the only big "baby", but nobody seems to mind.
11132112.content:
"Baby, don't you remember?...I'll be breastfeeding you at the park today!"

Hearing this, you are surprised. It seems that you'd be exposing yourself and even though that should frighten you a little, you feel comfortable with the idea, especially given that the powers the diapers grant you.

"Alright!"

Having a new busty mother also helps.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------< br />
Arriving at the park, you see your mother urge you to move faster as she waits by the steps to the main grounds (Preview  )

Your diaper makes it a little difficult to move around as it turns out. At the moment, you just bear with it but as you climb the steps with her, you start to become anxious at what awaits.

The biggest question is...how do you fit in this park?
11132112.title: Local Park

choices: ...sees a friend of hers coming by.
111321121.content:
The main view of the park comes into sight as you travel with Melissa, holding hands. Maybe it's just a coincidence, but you see a surprising amount of mothers nursing their babies and toddlers. You don't recognize the park, so maybe it's just friendlier to public breastfeeding.

As you think that, you see a yellow sign of a female holding a baby to her chest and the following words: "Breastfeeding Encouraged."

'No, this is too oddly timed,' you thought, but knowing that the magical diaper covers your changes more than what you desire could be good or bad. It's too early to tell.

One thing you notice as you scan the small hills, trees, and benches is that there isn't a person in sight that is like you. Given that your current state is far from normal though, you figure that it shouldn't be surprising.

"It's a lovely area, isn't it?" she breathed, then nudges you along with a warm smile, "...you're not here for the sights though, are you? Mommy's got plenty of milk for you so don't worry!"

You blush and a silly grin grows on your face. "Y-yes, mommy!"

If you were to comment on the sights, you've really enhanced Melissa. It's hard to even see her as your mother since she's changed so drastically but that definitely helps lower your inhibitions too.

Following her, you find a nice shaded spot and Melissa spreads out a tablecloth that she had carried over. Smoothing out the lines, she sits down with her legs off to the side and pats her lap.

"Come here," she coos as she begins removing her top.

Since this is core to your wishes which involved changing her, you don't hesitate while grinning like a fool. You are unable to help but let out a childish giggle.

"Mommy!"

When she reveals her well-endowed chest, you begin your real lunch with the tuna sandwich you ate before nothing more than an appetizer to hold you over.

Latching over her supple nipple, you let out a heavenly groan while you face submerges into her flesh. She giggles in response at your eagerness than supports your body with her arms.

Milk flows according to your desire but it takes a bit for you to find a proper rhythm. Being more than just a baby though, you also take your time to ravish her chest, unlike a baby. Despite slobbering over her chest though, Melissa maintains a proper hold over you and caresses your hair. It doesn't seem she minds how perverted you attack her chest.

A few minutes in with a tent forming in your magical diaper thanks to your excitement, you unlatch from Melissa's chest with a pop and a bit of milk dripping from your mouth. You hadn't given it much thought thanks to Melissa's delicious presence, but it occurred to you that other people could easily see you and your mother.

Yet, when you look around, everyone seemed to be minding their own business. Even in the shade, someone your size and half-naked should've been obvious.

You're curious as to the diapered implications of your wish.

"Sweetie, what is it? Something bothering you?" Melissa asks, still stroking her hair.

"I was just thinking," you begin, "...I'm the only big baby around here."

Melissa chuckles, finding your observation to be cute. "No need to be self-conscious. Even if you are bigger than most, you're still my baby. More people are comfortable letting their children grow up, but I think it's important to take as much time as possible."

'At my age, it's more than enough time,' you think but you wouldn't refute her given it's not entirely her fault for thinking like that. Without further delay, you continue nursing at your mother's chest.

As you suckle without a care in the world, Melissa...
111321121.title: One of a Kind

1113211211.content:
At your real age, it's no surprise that you'd get hard. Despite this still being your mother, it really isn't anymore. She's been completely replaced by this busty woman who cares for her big baby.

"You're really excited today, aren't you?" she chuckles.

You nod, sucking even more ferociously now that she's aware of your state. While she comments on it like it's the most normal thing, you notice that she doesn't do anything about it.

Why would she?

That might be just a struggle you'd have to manage yourself but luckily, it doesn't have to be. While you might be an overgrown baby, it doesn't have to mean that she can't "spoil" you in other ways.

In these magical diapers, what do you wish for?

"If this squid were any more raw it would be telling Sponge Bob to fuck off!" Chef Gordo screamed at you.

You listened to the words your superior yelled at you. It wasn't the first time he demeaned your cooking. Another shift passed and you had yet to feel better about your career decisions.

It was two in the morning and you were sitting on the curb of the parking lot. You tossed your cigarette butt off to the gutter as a car drove up to you.

"Hey kid, don't be a fucking idiot," The guy inside said as he threw a lamp at you.

The lamp hit your head and clanged as it hit the ground. The man in the car sped off; leaving you alone with the lamp.

"I guess I'll just rub this, like a goddamn Disney movie," You mutter as you pick up the lamp. "I wish this was a real, magic lamp. If this was a real magic lamp then I would wish..."

Laura thought for a bit, "If I make a list of things, can it all be on one wish?"

"Of course master."

Laura smiled, oh this was perfect! "One moment genie." She said as she pulled out her notebook and a pencil. 'Toilets do not exist, everyone uses diapers without shame or embarrassment. Cars and trucks will be swapped out for those plastic toddler foot powered cars, just a bit larger. Clothing will be extremely infantile and cute, so will hair styles. Clothes will not cover at all, or barely cover, the diaper, and high school is the equivalent to daycare.' Laura looked at her first list compiled, "There, genie, I wish everything on this list is true, and will take effect tomorrow."

On her way home, Laura was walking on air! She couldn't wait for tomorrow!

"meanig that everything was like it was back in real preschool. No tests no schoolwork no drama just play time and nap time with nice teachers taking care of you."
"I that is what your wish master."
"Also make it so the students can't walk yet."
"very well master." with a nod of genies head the gymnasium transformed into a preschool classroom with teenager sized toys and play areas. Laura soon found herself unable to balance on her feet causing her to fall on the ground. Soon after high school aged children including the cheerleaders and logan came crawling in with their diapered bottoms in a neat little row.
"Aw thaer so cewt." Laura said in a babyish voice. "Hey whath don't wif my voise?" genie disguised as a teenage toddler as well.
"you said you wan ned fo it tewbe like weal pweschool. This is how pweschoolers talk." she said also with a babyish voice. "
Do you wike it mastewr?"
"actuawy I fink it's cute." she said with a grin. Genie then stopped moving as it was clear she was pooping. She then started crying until a teacher came over.
"Aw was'su matter lil'Jeannie." a women with a soothing voice said that Laura didn't recognize.
"I HAD AN ACCIDENT WAAAAAHHHHH!!" genie said crying.
"Aw c'mere puddin' and Mrs. Wilson will get you all cleaned up ok?". Genie nodded. "Okie dokie then let's go." she then effortlessly picked up genie who was almost the same size as the teacher and started heading for a changing mat.
"Twy to enjoy youwrself. I know I will." genie whispered as she was carried off.
Now what?
12112122211221.title: High school to become preschool

She crawled over to a sleep mat laid down and drifted off to sleep. When she awoke she had pooped I her diaper feeling an uncontrolable urge to cry. Unable to contain it she jus started bawling. She continued to cry until she was picked up from behind by an unknown person, who then proceeded to change her stinky diaper. When she was done she picked Laura up and said "My my your a stinky little girl aren't ya?" it was lauras mother Carrie. "Time to go him sweetie I already got your sister in the stroller so lets go." she then put her daughter in the stroller and took them home.

As they walked through the store they came upon a childs toy store.

"very well master." genie said smiling. And in an instant there was a fenced off area wit Teddy bears dolls action figures and infant play things.

choices: Logan acted more like a baby/toddler
1211212222.content:
"I kinda really need a change," Logan stated bashfully.

Laura giggled. She knew Logan was sheepish, but she wasn't aware of how adorable it made him look. Logan hopped onto the changing table and laid down. Laura undid Logan’s diaper and was hit with a strong smell.

“Phew! You weren't kidding when you said you really needed a change!” Laura teased.

Logan blushed and sacked his thumb. Laura looked at him, a bit shocked at the action, but then smiled.

“Aww,” she cooed as she wiped him up.

She smiled at how babyish Logan looked, which gave her an idea.

“Genie!” She yelled.

The Genie appeared, and time stopped.

“Yes, master?” She inquired.

Laura pondered for a moment, took a deep breath, and stated her wish.

“I wish…………”
1211212222.title: Change logan

choices: She realized she wasn't in class anymore but at her house
12112122221.content:
"...Logan was a two year old baby boy."

The Genie blinked, trying to understand Laura's request.

"You realize he'd be too young to be your boyfriend, right?" The Genie stated.

Laura nodded.

"I think I want to be his mommy more."

The Genie sighed.

"Your wish is my command," The Genie sprinkled some magic looking dust on Logan. Laura watched in awe as Logan began to get smaller and smaller until he was a cute little twp year old baby boy.

"Aww!" She squead.

Soon, the Genie disappeared as time resumed. Logan looked up at Laura and sucked his thumb.

"Hi sweetie," She smiled at the boy.

Laura then picked Logan up and held him close. Logan snuggled into Laura in response.

"Hewwo mama," He squeaked.

She smiled and stroked Logan's hair. Laura then felt a warm liquid touch her skin. She gently pulled Logan off of her and realized that the boy was peeing on her, causing Laura to gasp.

"Logan! You're peeing all over mommy!"

Logan giggled and sucked his thumb as he continued peeing. Laura sighed and chuckled.

"Me pee on you!" He squealed.

" Oh Logan..."

The boy's peeing soon ceased, and Laura then laid Logan back on the changing table and proceeded to wipe him up again.

"Try not to pee on mommy, okay buddy?" She cooed to Logan, knowing he can't control it.

"Me twy mama."

Laura chuckled as she oiled and powdered his crotch and bottom before finally diapering him. She picked him up and held him close. Again, the boy snuggled into Laura.

"Tankies mama."

Laura smiled.

"You're welcome, sweetie. "

Just then....
12112122221.title: Logan was a toddler  (2)

info.brief_description: A day to alter reality however you want how will you change it?
info.description:
You can alter reality with a variety of different options that can't be changed after the day ends. This is a heavy diaper fetish story so please keep It that way.
No , size change, gay stuff, transgender stuff, or furries for the main character. limited age regression/progression and none for the main character.
For the other characters; absolutely no vore, gore, weight gain, gay or transgender stuff.
Other than that, go nuts.
Btw your a 17 year old named either Logan/Laura. Enjoy
